output_format.label: Summary of Significant Events After Reporting Period
Narrative: Description of non-adjusting events after the reporting period (e.g., major acquisition, equity issuance, large debt restructuring, damage from natural disaster).
Narrative: Estimate of the financial effect of these events or a statement that such an estimate cannot be made.

additional_instructions: This note requires manual input and qualitative/narrative disclosure as per IAS 10 / Ind AS 10. The output format serves only as a structured template reminder and will show zero/blank values from the Trial Balance.
